EmailTemplate.description: Notification is generated whenver user updates the Quantity OR Average Sales Price for any year on 'Revenue Forecasting'
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: BX009 whose Revenue Forecast has been updated
EmailTemplate.subject: The Revenue Forecast related to GMPL/ BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, There has been an update on Quantity or Average Sales Price of Revenue Forecast related to GMPL/ BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}'. The related BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks
